article_title: Transparency Is Still A Problem As Big Pharma Struggles With Its Image

article_metadata.author: John LaMattina

og.description: But as Ian Read said, “You gain respect in drops”. A few drops would be helpful alleviating the drought suffered in pharma’s reputation.
